channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Optimizing AI Application Development with Docker Desktop and NVIDIA AI Workbench
item.description: Learn about Docker's collaboration with NVIDIA, which enhances your ability to leverage Docker containers and improves your overall experience of building and developing AI/ML applications. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/optimizing-ai-application-development-docker-desktop-nvidia-ai-workbench/

item.title: How to Fix ESLint Violations with AI Assistance
item.description: Learn how to use GenAI to fix ESLint violations, without installing Node. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/how-to-fix-eslint-violations-with-ai-assistance/
